attributes.action: Lift all sanctions from Syria and help the country with Aid and support.
attributes.additional_details:
I urge and would like the UK government to clear up the mess that has been created from a decade of war and fulfil the rights and essential needs of the people who are under immense pressure to even stay alive with the very basics to live. 
people need everything from medication,Sanitation,
Food, clothes and energy supplies and living accommodations to be able to house families+begin the stages of rebuilding this country.Rule out the corruption and treat this place with respect.Save their lives.
attributes.background: During these times of difficulty and a disaster of a catastrophic proportions, we as the uk citizens wish to see sanctions lifted from Syria in order to support and help its people in need and stop being selective about who should be helped when these are people who have every human right to live.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632889
